title: Grain elevator
creator_credit: Wayne Finucan Productions and Charles Konawal
brief_description: Basic film about the workings of an old family style grain mill, a one to two man operation. One hundred and fifty box cars per year of grain are provided from about 100 small farmers.
description: Basic film about the workings of an old family style grain mill, a one to two man operation. One hundred and fifty box cars per year of grain are provided from about 100 small farmers.
